languages.text: "Богохульные {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}ксеносы{/g} уже пытались убить {mf|его|ее} на арене, но потерпели крах! {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Император{/g} защищает!" {n}Комиссар вдохновенно вещает, нагло глядя вам прямо в глаза. Его слова вызывают у окружающих потрясенные и ликующие улыбки. Ни одного из этих людей вы не видели прежде.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Богохульные {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}ксеносы{/g} уже пытались убить {mf|его|ее} на арене, но потерпели крах! {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Император{/g} защищает!" {n}Комиссар вдохновенно вещает, нагло глядя вам прямо в глаза. Его слова вызывают у окружающих потрясенные и ликующие улыбки. Ни одного из этих людей вы не видели прежде.{/n}
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: "The maleficent {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} have already tried to kill {mf|him|her} in the arena, yet their efforts were for naught! The {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} protects!" {n}The Commissar gives his inspirational speech while looking you right in the eye without a shred of shame. His words draw smiles of amazement and exultation from the people around him. You have never seen any of them before.{/n}

The {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} protects!" {n}The Commissar gives his inspirational speech while looking you right in the eye without a shred of shame. His words draw smiles of amazement and exultation from the people around him. You have never seen any of them before.{/n}

languages.text: “那些邪恶的{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}异形{/g}曾试图在竞技场上夺走{mf|他|她}的性命，然而，他们的阴谋全都失败了！{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}帝皇{/g}会保佑祂的子民！”{n}政委发表了一通鼓舞人心的演讲，同时直视你的双眼，没有一丝愧疚之意。他的演讲激起了周围人惊讶与赞叹的笑容，你之前从来没见过这些人。{/n}
languages.original_text: "The maleficent {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} have already tried to kill {mf|him|her} in the arena, yet their efforts were for naught! The {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} protects!" {n}The Commissar gives his inspirational speech while looking you right in the eye without a shred of shame. His words draw smiles of amazement and exultation from the people around him. You have never seen any of them before.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “那些邪恶的{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}异形{/g}曾试图在竞技场上夺走{mf|他|她}的性命，然而，他们的阴谋全都失败了！{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}帝皇{/g}会保佑祂的子民！”{n}政委发表了一通鼓舞人心的演讲，同时直视你的双眼，没有一丝愧疚之意。他的演讲激起了周围人惊讶与赞叹的笑容，你之前从来没见过这些人。{/n}
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: 「邪悪な{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}異種族{/g}は{mf|彼|彼女}をアリーナで殺そうと目論んだが、ごらんのとおり{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}皇帝{/g}のご加護により失敗に終わった！」{n}コミッサーは一切恥を見せずこちらの目を見ながら士気の上がる演説を行った。彼の言葉に周囲の人々は驚きと歓喜の笑みを浮かべている。見たことのない顔ぶればかりだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: "The maleficent {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} have already tried to kill {mf|him|her} in the arena, yet their efforts were for naught! The {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} protects!" {n}The Commissar gives his inspirational speech while looking you right in the eye without a shred of shame. His words draw smiles of amazement and exultation from the people around him. You have never seen any of them before.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「邪悪な{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}異種族{/g}は{mf|彼|彼女}をアリーナで殺そうと目論んだが、ごらんのとおり{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}皇帝{/g}のご加護により失敗に終わった！」{n}コミッサーは一切恥を見せずこちらの目を見ながら士気の上がる演説を行った。彼の言葉に周囲の人々は驚きと歓喜の笑みを浮かべている。見たことのない顔ぶればかりだ。{/n}
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: «Los malévolos {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} ya han intentado matarl{mf|e|a} en la arena, ¡pero sus esfuerzos han sido en vano! ¡El {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperador{/g} protege!». {n}El Comisario da su arenga mientras te mira a los ojos, sin ningún rastro de vergüenza. Sus palabras generan sonrisas de asombro y júbilo en los rostros de la gente que le rodea. No habías visto antes a ninguno de ellos.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The maleficent {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} have already tried to kill {mf|him|her} in the arena, yet their efforts were for naught! The {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} protects!" {n}The Commissar gives his inspirational speech while looking you right in the eye without a shred of shame. His words draw smiles of amazement and exultation from the people around him. You have never seen any of them before.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Los malévolos {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} ya han intentado matarl{mf|e|a} en la arena, ¡pero sus esfuerzos han sido en vano! ¡El {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperador{/g} protege!». {n}El Comisario da su arenga mientras te mira a los ojos, sin ningún rastro de vergüenza. Sus palabras generan sonrisas de asombro y júbilo en los rostros de la gente que le rodea. No habías visto antes a ninguno de ellos.{/n}
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.original_text: "The maleficent xenos have already tried to kill {mf|him|her} in the arena, yet their efforts were for naught! The Emperor protects!" {n}The Commissar gives his inspirational speech while looking you right in the eye without a shred of shame. His words draw smiles of amazement and exultation from the people around him. You have never seen any of them before.{/n}

languages.text: « Les {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xénos{/g}, dans toute leur malveillance, ont déjà essayé de {mf|le|la} tuer dans l'arène, mais ils ont lamentablement échoué ! L'{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Empereur{/g} protège ! » {n}Pendant qu'il prononce son discours, le commissaire garde son regard planté dans le vôtre sans la moindre vergogne. Vous remarquez que les gens autour de lui affichent un grand sourire ébahi proche de l'exultation. Dans cette foule, aucun visage ne vous est familier.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The maleficent {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} have already tried to kill {mf|him|her} in the arena, yet their efforts were for naught! The {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} protects!" {n}The Commissar gives his inspirational speech while looking you right in the eye without a shred of shame. His words draw smiles of amazement and exultation from the people around him. You have never seen any of them before.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Les xénos, dans toute leur malveillance, ont déjà essayé de {mf|le|la} tuer dans l'arène, mais ils ont lamentablement échoué ! L'{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Empereur{/g} protège ! » {n}Pendant qu'il prononce son discours, le commissaire garde son regard planté dans le vôtre sans la moindre vergogne. Vous remarquez que les gens autour de lui affichent un grand sourire ébahi proche de l'exultation. Dans cette foule, aucun visage ne vous est familier.{/n}
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: "Die üblen {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Xenos{/g} haben bereits versucht, {mf|ihn|sie} in der Arena zu töten, aber ihre Bemühungen blieben erfolglos! Der {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Imperator{/g} schützt uns!" {n}Der Kommissar hält seine Motivationsansprache ohne jede Scham, während er dir direkt in die Augen sieht. Seine Worte erzeugen bei den Zuhörern ein erstauntes Lächeln und Ehrfurcht. Du hast keinen davon je gesehen.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The maleficent {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} have already tried to kill {mf|him|her} in the arena, yet their efforts were for naught! The {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} protects!" {n}The Commissar gives his inspirational speech while looking you right in the eye without a shred of shame. His words draw smiles of amazement and exultation from the people around him. You have never seen any of them before.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Die üblen {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Xenos{/g} haben bereits versucht, {mf|ihn|sie} in der Arena zu töten, aber ihre Bemühungen blieben erfolglos! Der {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Imperator{/g} schützt uns!" {n}Der Kommissar hält seine Motivationsansprache ohne jede Scham, während er dir direkt in die Augen sieht. Seine Worte erzeugen bei den Zuhörern ein erstauntes Lächeln und Ehrfurcht. Du hast keinen davon je gesehen.{/n}
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: "Habis {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}zenolar{/g} onu arenada öldürmeyi denedi fakat çabaları sonuç vermedi! {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}İmparator{/g} korur!" {n}Komiser, ilham verici konuşmasını yaparken en ufak bir utanç duymadan gözlerinin içine bakıyor. Sözleri, çevresindeki insanlarda hayranlık uyandırıp ve yüzlerinde sevinç dolu gülümsemeler meydana getiriyor. Bu insanların hiçbirini daha önce görmemiştin.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The maleficent {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} have already tried to kill {mf|him|her} in the arena, yet their efforts were for naught! The {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} protects!" {n}The Commissar gives his inspirational speech while looking you right in the eye without a shred of shame. His words draw smiles of amazement and exultation from the people around him. You have never seen any of them before.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Habis {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}zeno{/g}lar onu arenada öldürmeyi denedi bile ancak çabaları sonuç vermedi! {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}İmparator{/g} korur!" {n}Komiser, ilham verici konuşmasını yaparken, gözlerinin içine en ufak bir utanç bile duymadan bakıyor. Sözcükleri, çevresindeki insanların yüzünde hayranlık ve sevinç dolu gülümsemeler uyandırıyor. Hiçbirini daha önce görmemiştin.{/n}
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True
